pages.text: Are you dreaming of hosting a remarkable event that will be cherished for a lifetime? Look no further! Whether it's a wedding, anniversary, birthday celebration, corporate gathering, or any other special event, our team is dedicated to crafting extraordinary moments for you and your guests.

Special Events & Weddings

Corporate events | Weddings | Private Parties

Welcome hank you for considering our venue to celebrate your life’s event! ​ The historic Floridian Social Club started off as Alexander National Bank in 1924. It was a staple among Central Ave. known for it’s beautiful art deco architecture. In 1940. the bank was purchased and transformed into the State Theater. During the height of motion pictures, this was only one of five movie theaters in the area at the time. In 2019, State Theater was purchased to be transformed into an upscale, social club and entertainment venue – Floridian Social Club. While preserving the integrity from its origins and paying homage to the many years as a theater (as well as keeping the infamous signature wall), the Floridian Social Club is the most prestigious historic venue in St. Petersburg. Today, it is the only historic theater that remains in St. Petersburg. We are now hosting private events and want to celebrate with you! Our Venue The Floridian Social Club is a high-class, Prohibition-Era venue that caters to: Corporate Events Weddings Private Parties ​ Booking Capacities: Standing: 600 Theater: 350 Seated Banquet: 100 Features: 1920’s Prohibition-style venue with over 9,000 sq ft. of flexible event space Full Bar service & Event packages Two private dressing rooms In-house state-of-the-art Audio/Visual Customizable Modular stage Upstairs Mezzanine with a second bar overlooking the Main Theater Permitted Occupancy: 765 END MAIN Instagram post 18056731016190001 License to Lounge. Jazz whispers through the air, May 15, sultry jazz sets the mood while vintage 00 The Floridian Social will be closed this Sunday, M TL Jentgens is a phenomenon. Event featured image, but exclude link
Event content
We’re Closed for a Private Event – See You Soon!
Our venue will be closed on August 31 for a private event. We are excited to celebrate this special occasion with a private group and will not be open to the public on this date.
If you’re interested in hosting your own private event at our historic Art Deco venue, feel free to reach out to us at
specialevents@thefloridiansocial.com
For updates and more information about our upcoming events, visit our
website
or follow us on
instagram
. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to welcoming you back soon!
